Skibidi Toilet is an addictive and hilarious mobile game that will keep you entertained for hours! üöΩ This game offers a unique and comical take on a classic toilet humor theme. The objective is simple: help the character Skibidi stay on the toilet as long as possible while avoiding various obstacles and challenges.

Game Controls:

Tap: Tap the screen to make Skibidi stay on the toilet.
Swipe Left/Right: Swipe left or right to move Skibidi, avoiding obstacles and collecting power-ups.

How to Play:

Get Ready: Launch the game and press play to start.
Stay Balanced: Your goal is to keep Skibidi balanced on the toilet. Tap the screen at the right time to maintain his position.
Avoid Obstacles: Watch out for plungers, toilet paper rolls, and rubber ducks. Swipe left or right to dodge these obstacles.
Collect Power-ups: Grab power-ups along the way to gain advantages and extend your toilet time.
Compete for High Scores: Beat your own high score or challenge friends to see who can stay on the toilet the longest! üèÜ
